level.heading: Stealing, destroying, mutilating, secreting, or withholding will.
Prior Codifications
level.text: Decedent’s estate — Secreting or converting property, documents, or assets; taking away or concealing writings. [Repealed].

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 4-164
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-164, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 22-1501.
